question: Which of the following in the consequence when a no-confidence motion is passed against the council of ministers in legislative assembly?
option2: All the ministers have to resign
answer: All the ministers have to resign
explanation: The members of legislative assembly work as a team and swim or sink together. When the legislative assembly of the state passes a no-confidence motion against the council of ministers, all the ministers have to resign even those ministers who are from the legislative council.
